item.title: Dexit Means Dexit
item.description: In the most controversial political move this century the Pok√©mon company has stated that in the Galar region we no longer “Gotta catch ‘em all"‚Ñ¢, in fact we can’t they won’t all be available! Since the number of Pok√©mon in Kanto and Dunbar’s number are approximately equal I think that is a fair number of older Pok√©mon that will make it across the border. I’m assuming in Galar the legendary creatures can get a special visa or something.

item.title: Presenting Revmoji
item.description: tl;dr: use an emoji-based system to improve communication in code reviews üòÜ Definitions The contributor is the person or persons submitting the change request. The reviewer is the person or persons checking the change request. Emoji Description ‚àÖ The emptymoji (‚àÖ) is much like the empty set and everything is true of the empty set üòÑ. The reviewer expects the contributor to make a change to the code, or is requiring a clarification from the contributor about the code.

item.title: Alright time's up, let's do this!
item.description: Welcome to hopefully the first of a series of posts detailing my battles with technology. Trying to plug all the things together and make them play nice, and hopefully no big explosions. Always remember folks in infrastructure, ‚ÄúIf anything exciting happens, we’ve done it wrong‚Äù. We have recently been working on improving our test infrastructure. Previously this was a large bash script (as all the best projects are üòâ) running within a single job on a Jenkins CI server.
